dataset_id: IceBridge ATM L2 Icessn Elevation, Slope, and Roughness V002
title: IceBridge ATM L2 Icessn Elevation, Slope, and Roughness V002
summary: This data set contains resampled and smoothed elevation measurements of Arctic and Antarctic sea ice, and Greenland, Antarctic Peninsula, and West Antarctic region land ice surface acquired using the NASA Airborne Topographic Mapper (ATM) instrumentation. The data were collected as part of Operation IceBridge funded aircraft survey campaigns.
